Room.Name: Small Alley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small alley north of West Hafnia Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: The alley smells of excrement and urine, and you see boxes and barrels have been stacked so as to form temporary shelters for the homeless. This is not a place the city fathers would want a visitor to see. Glittering eyes peer at you from under a pile of rags. All of the doors you see appear locked. Well, that is, all except one.
